name: extract_text
description: Extract text content from a DOCX artifact. Use this tool when you need to read text from a Word document.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the DOCX artifact to extract text from

text.description: The complete extracted text from the document
The extracted text from this paragraph

style.description: The style name of the paragraph (e.g., 'Normal', 'Heading 1')

paragraphs.description: Text extracted from each paragraph separately with style information

name: extract_tables
description: Extract tables from a DOCX artifact. Use this tool when you need to extract tabular data from a Word document.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the DOCX artifact to extract tables from

format.description: Output format for table data. 'json' returns array of arrays, 'markdown' returns formatted markdown table.

table_index.description: The index of the table in the document (0-indexed)

data.description: The table data. Array of arrays for JSON format, markdown string for markdown format.

name: create_docx
description: Create a DOCX document from text or markdown content and save it as an artifact. Use this tool when you need to generate a Word document.

user_id.description: The user ID who owns the artifact

project_id.description: The project ID where the artifact belongs

filename.description: The filename for the DOCX (will automatically add .docx extension if missing)

content.description: The text or markdown content to convert to DOCX

format.description: The format of the input content. 'text' for plain text, 'markdown' for markdown with headings and formatting.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the created artifact

s3_bucket.description: The S3 bucket where the DOCX is stored

s3_key.description: The S3 key of the DOCX

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the artifact was created

name: edit_docx
description: Edit an existing DOCX artifact by replacing its content. Use this tool when you need to update a Word document.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the DOCX artifact to edit

content.description: The new text or markdown content for the DOCX

format.description: The format of the input content

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the edited artifact

s3_bucket.description: The S3 bucket where the DOCX is stored

s3_key.description: The S3 key of the DOCX

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the artifact was updated
